title.bibl: Svenska Nyheter, Apr. 25, 1905. Real Estate Transactions

div.bibl: Svenska Nyheter, Apr. 25, 1905. REAL ESTATE TRANSACTIONS

body.p: During the past week, five transfers of real estate took place in Chicago, in which the buyer, the seller, or both were Scandinavians:
J. P. Linde to Augusta M.Hjerstedt, Warner Avenue west of W. Ravenswood Park; price $1,250.
J. Waline to Peter Shogren, Talman Avenue north of Humboldt Boulevard; price $5,250.
Thomas E. Sullivan to Gust Lindell, Sheridan Road corner of Winona Street; price $6,000.
E. D. Weary to Oluf Larsen, Winthrop Avenue south of Leland Avenue; price $3,250.
C. M. Engstrom to Michael F. Rascher, Bishop Street north of 56th Street; price $2,300.
